title: Letter: Spurning the FT Lunch's usual bevvy gets my vote
text:
James Anderson may have offended purists such as Nicola Ricolfi in his choice of fritto misto rather than the “more appropriate” tagliatelle for his Lunch with the FT (Letters, April 23) but at least he didn't choose to accompany it with the vile Diet Coke, the preferred beverage of so many FT Lunchers.

Sally Turff
King's Lynn, Norfolk, UK
